name: coursera_compare_courses
description: Compare multiple courses on Coursera by searching and extracting their ratings, providers, enrollment counts, and levels side by side.

parameters.name: courses
parameters.description: Comma-separated course names (e.g. 'machine learning,deep learning,data science')

detailSteps.code: const first = document.querySelector('[data-testid="search-result"]:first-child, [class*="result-card"]:first-child, li[class*="ais-"]:first-child, [class*="ProductCard"]:first-child'); if (!first) { const link = document.querySelector('a[href*="/learn/"]'); return { name: '', provider: '', rating: '', url: link ? link.href : '' }; } const titleEl = first.querySelector('h3, h2, [class*="title"]'); const providerEl = first.querySelector('[class*="partner"], [class*="provider"]'); const ratingEl = first.querySelector('[class*="rating"] span, [class*="stars"]'); const enrollmentEl = first.querySelector('[class*="enrollment"], [class*="students"]'); const levelEl = first.querySelector('[class*="level"], [class*="difficulty"]'); const linkEl = first.querySelector('a[href*="/learn/"], a[href*="/specializations/"]'); return { name: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', provider: providerEl ? providerEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', enrollment: enrollmentEl ? enrollmentEl.textContent.trim() : '', level: levelEl ? levelEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }
detailSteps.name: course_info
detailSteps.label: Extract top result
